content: work 6 row of 3 sts decrease 1 last 2 sts decrease finish off this is the toe end toebox and tongue work 10 sts around toe 4 at sides 2 at end turn 1 row of 10 sts 1ch miss 3 sts 2tr in next 2 treble_crochet 2tr in next slip_stitch in last st of prev row 16 turn without a chain and slip_stitch into first treble_crochet 2ch 5tr 2 chain skip 1 treble_crochet 5 treble_crochet last in top of chain repeat last row once finish off back and sides with toe facing to your right rejoin yarn to first st of front part near sole of right side of toebox 4st along side of sole increase into each of 3 end sts 6sts at end 4 on other side and 1 into 1st st of toebox slip_stitch into next toebox st and turn no chain miss the slip_stitch and work 14 repeat last row twice slip_stitch into next toebox st 5ch turn 4 into chain 14 slip_stitch into next toebox st 5ch turn 4 and fasten onto side with slip_stitch cut yarn tidy loose ends put shoe on foot if you have any gorld or silver thread use it to sew the two side flaps together over the tongue like a buckle otherwise any yarn could be used perhaps embroider a small lazy daisy for a rosette i took the last needle full of thread right through the doll s foot to keep the shoes in place give her a bead necklace and she is done 17
